StepDetailsRTF: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Arial;}}  {\colortbl ;\red0\green128\blue255;}  \viewkind4\uc1\pard\f0\fs22 Time bulk container(s) of \cf1 &Ingredient&\cf0  (Item 01) removed from 2\$baC to 8\$baC storage.\fs24\par  \par  \fs22 Do \ul not\ulnone  open bulk container(s) of Item 01 for a minimum of 12 hours.\f1\fs18\par  }
